Evolution of Design and Research in Civic Tech 💻🥼

Oct 20, 2025

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • design
  • accessibility
  • research
  • artificial intelligence
  • leadership

We’re joined by Senongo Akpem Vice President of Design and Research at Nava PBC. Together we talk about shifts in the direction of the design and research practice, innovative practices to build capacity and leadership within it, and its future as new tools like artificial intelligence emerge and become part of it.
